name: Arrows of oblivion
description:
Plunderers of a ruined city awake a cursed warrior from past era...

This valley was once an abode to an ancient civilization, whose people dared to challenge the Divine Order. In present day however, it's merely a home to outlaws and marauders. They pillage through the land, looking for ancient relics - treasures from the past. But deep within the labyrinth of this city's ruins, a cursed warrior awakes. Driven by his unresolved desires, he hunts down the trespassers.

-----------------------------------------------------

A little game I made initially for android, but I think I'll share it here as well :)

If you're interested in android version:
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.MinervaMana.Arrowsofoblivion

This game uses icons made by Freepik from www.flaticon.com
